codes.ADDI: Narrative text describing the additional terms and conditions.
codes.CHAR: Narrative text describing the charge details.
codes.DRAW: Narrative text describing the drawing details.
codes.PRAS: Narrative text describing the assignment of proceeds terms and conditions.
codes.TEFF: Narrative text describing the terms of effectiveness.
codes.TRNF: Narrative text describing the transfer terms and conditions.
codes.TVAR: Narrative text describing the terms of variation.

description: Specifies the external narrative type code in the format of a character string with a maximum length of 4 characters. The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
name: ExternalNarrativeType1Code
